short_summary: Due to the 17 days notification period, the solicitation number is 2BH2124131A. The desired desktop peripheral locking kits with additional locking eyelet will be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario, in 90 federal government working days.
description: Public Safety Canada has a requirement for desktop peripheral locking kits with additional locking eyelet. The department is implementing hybrid workstations across the department. These hybrid workstations are equipped with one large curved monitor or two smaller monitors, a docking station, a keyboard and a mouse. The contract requires that the IT equipment are protected against theft. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.
